other.notes: The package bundles transport, multiple city hotel stays, guided sightseeing and some meals — these bundled services are difficult to price precisely via OTAs without exact hotels, dates and coach/guide supplier quotes.

reasoning: Unable to produce a reliable DIY total in the same currency and level of service because: (1) the provided Flight Centre price appears to be in a different/local currency (likely NZD) while comparable supplier listings (Globus/resellers) show published prices in USD; (2) the package bundles multiple non-hotel items (private coach, tour director, guided experiences and some meals) that are not straightforward to replicate or price exactly on booking engines without specific hotels, suppliers and departure date; (3) preliminary checks of the tour operator/reseller pages show per-person 'from' prices materially lower than the supplied 10289 figure (see citations), suggesting the Flight Centre package is unlikely to be clearly cheaper — a definitive savings calculation requires the deal currency and exact travel dates.
additional_notes: To perform a conclusive comparison and compute DIY totals you can provide: (a) the currency of the pp_price (e.g., NZD or AUD), (b) specific departure date, or (c) permission to assume a target departure date so I can price exact hotels (room-for-2), rail/coach legs or domestic flights and local supplier rates. If you want, I can re-run the analysis converting currencies and pricing hotels/transport for a chosen departure date.
